labels.name: @zulip/shared
labels.description: Good spots to share code with the webapp

labels.name: a-compose/send
labels.description: Compose box, autocomplete, camera/upload, outbox, sending

labels.name: a-data-sync
labels.description: Zulip's event system, event queues, staleness/liveness

labels.name: a-onboarding
labels.description: Everything you would do when first joining a realm.

labels.name: a-TLS
labels.description: TLS/SSL certificates and config; "Cannot connect to server" errors

labels.name: blocked on other work
labels.description: To come back to after another related PR, or some other task.

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

labels.name: dupe from server
labels.description: Task kept open to track a zulip/zulip issue affecting mobile

labels.name: experimental UI/UX
labels.description: To be user-tested in experimental build

labels.name: severe: crash
labels.description: The app quits, or stops responding.

labels.name: upstream: other
labels.description: Issues related to an issue in another dependency

labels.name: upstream: React
labels.description: Issues related to an issue in React (not React Native)

labels.name: upstream: RN
labels.description: Issues related to an issue in React Native
